Teachings of Loss Lights Love was a Sharran text, printed before the 15 century DR.
The tome was dedicated to an important concept of the Sharran faith the absence of love. The book preached a dogma of love being a destructive force in ones life, a type of corruption that can entrap and enthrall a person within a moment, a passing glimpse. Loves warmth and comfort were an offense to Shars emptiness and oblivion, and as such, the Church commanded its devotees to forcefully extinguish any embers of love and affection in their hearts, leaving behind nothing by ashes and a hungry heart.
By the , a copy of Teachings of Loss Lights Love could be found in abandoned and ruined secret temple to Shar underneath the town of Reithwin, the Gauntlet of Shar.
